amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the amount in the Bureau of Land Management account available for the processing of applications for drilling permits by $4,452,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the amount in the Bureau of Land Management account available for the processing of applications for drilling permits by $4,452,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hochul amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 271 (Roll no. 636).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hochul amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 141 - 271 (Roll no. 636).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Hochul.
